institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Skill Competition Management Rules/Article 26 (Support for Occupation Council)
contents: Article 26 (Support for Occupational Councils) ① The Korean Commission may partially support operating expenses incurred in seminars, workshops, etc. held by registered occupational councils within the scope of the budget. ② Regarding support matters for occupational councils, the Chairman of the Korean Committee This shall be separately determined and implemented.
